snippet: Senator Robert Menendez of New Jersey and other readers react to an editorial that urged improved relations with Cuba.
abstract: Letter from New Jersey Sen Robert Menendez responds to October 12 editorial advocating United States repair ties with Cuba.
lead_paragraph: Senator Robert Menendez of New Jersey and other readers react to an editorial that urged improved relations with Cuba.

headline.main: Time to End the Embargo on Cuba?
headline.print_headline: Time to End the Embargo on Cuba?
